> Makes me want to cry.

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Update on child abuse situation
messages.msgSnippet: Thank goodness. I m so glad it went well for you guys, and for her. Please keep us informed of how it went.  Maybe i ll use your example sometime in the near
messages.messageBody:
Thank goodness. I'm so glad it went well for you guys, and for her.

Please keep us informed of how it went. Maybe i'll use your example sometime in the near future.

Kristen
----- Original Message -----
From: Julie Bogart
To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, July 17, 2004 3:58 PM
Subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Update on child abuse situation


Thanks for everyone's input.

We acted and she's got evidence that has been recorded at both the police station and the
hospital. One thing spoke loudly to me. She told me that until we acted, she had felt
paralyzed to act on her own behalf. Now she's ready to support the investigation and to
turn in her parents. Today, she feels optimistic about the future for the first time in years.
Makes me want to cry.

She's with us tonight. CPS will begin the investigation on Monday.

Julie B



"List Posting Policies" are provided in the files area of this group.

Visit the Unschooling website and message boards: http://www.unschooling.com

messages.subject: Update on child abuse situation
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks for everyone s input. We acted and she s got evidence that has been recorded at both the police station and the hospital. One thing spoke loudly to me.
messages.messageBody:
Thanks for everyone's input.

We acted and she's got evidence that has been recorded at both the police station and the
hospital. One thing spoke loudly to me. She told me that until we acted, she had felt
paralyzed to act on her own behalf. Now she's ready to support the investigation and to
turn in her parents. Today, she feels optimistic about the future for the first time in years.
Makes me want to cry.

She's with us tonight. CPS will begin the investigation on Monday.

Julie B
